subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Jurgen Klinsmann, coach of the U.S. men’s national team, is not happy one of his top players, Clint Dempsey, was suspended for two games by M.L.S.
snippet: Jurgen Klinsmann, coach of the U.S. men’s national team, is not happy one of his top players, Clint Dempsey, was suspended for two games by M.L.S.
